匹.definition: (bound form) matching; comparable to; (bound form) alone; single; one of a pair; classifier for horses, mules etc (Taiwan pr. [pi1]); classifier for cloth: bolt; horsepower

匹夫.definition: ordinary man; ignorant person; coarse fellow

匹敵.definition: to be equal to; to be well-matched; rival

匹配.definition: to mate or marry; to match; matching; compatible
